title: Live Transcribe is broken again.
content:
Live Transcribe didn't work when I got my Pixel 5. It was seemingly fixed by the November update (
https://support.google.com/pixelphone/thread/80544883?hl=en&msgid=80544883). I tried to use it this morning and it didn't work again with the same issue: sense no sound. Other apps work fine. Rebooted, force quit, cleared cache, etc. and no joy.
